xml.query: SELECT * FROM users where users.u_mail = ? AND users.u_pass = ?
insert into users (u_id, u_role, u_name, u_mail, u_pass) values (?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
select u_id from users
select * from users u where u_mail = ?
insert into suppliers(s_company_name, s_mob_num, u_id) values (?, ?, ?)
select u.u_id, u.u_mail, u.u_pass, u.u_name,s.s_mob_num, s.s_company_name, s.s_id, u.u_role from suppliers s join users u on u.u_id = s.u_id
select u.u_id, u.u_mail, u.u_pass, u.u_name,s.s_mob_num, s.s_company_name, s.s_id, u.u_role from users u, suppliers s where u.u_id = ? AND u.u_id = s.u_id
DELETE FROM suppliers s WHERE s.u_id = ?;
DELETE FROM users u WHERE u.u_id = ?;
UPDATE users u INNER JOIN suppliers s ON (u.u_id = s.u_id) SET u.u_name = ? ,u.u_mail = ? ,u.u_pass = ?,s.s_company_name = ?,s.s_mob_num = ? WHERE s.u_id = ?
